comments.raw_text:
STR:

1. Start off with <dialog buttons="accept,cancel" buttonlabelaccept="Yes">
2. dialog.setAttribute("buttonlabelaccept", "Proceed");
3. dialog.buttons = dialog.buttons (need to do this because of bug 667565)

The button label doesn't change. The reason for that is that the code at <https://mxr.mozilla.org/seamonkey/source/toolkit/content/widgets/dialog.xml#239> assumes that having a label attribute means that the button's explicit. Clearly even the implicit buttons have labels when _configureButtons is called a second time.
